mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( activity_assign_id, src_customer_group_id, claim_customer_group_id, src_open_id, claim_open_id, goods_id, goods_name, create_date, creator, create_ip ) VALUES ( #{activityAssignId}, #{srcCustomerGroupId}, #{claimCustomerGroupId}, #{srcOpenId}, #{claimOpenId}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsName}, NOW(), #{creator}, #{createIp} )
